options.content:
# VoltDB configuration

Below's information comes from @SystemInformation call, for detailed description please go to [documentation](https://docs.voltdb.com/UsingVoltDB/sysprocsysteminfo.php#sysprocsysinforetvalovervw).

panels.description: One of INITIALIZING, RUNNING, PAUSED, SHUTTINGDOWN
panels.title: Cluster state

elasticduration.text: target duration of rebalance transactions in milliseconds

elasticthroughput.text: target throughput of rebalance transactions in MB/second

temptablesmaxsize.text: maximum size of the temp tables

targets.expr: max (voltdb_systeminformation_deployment_info{v2="1", namespace="$cluster", host_name=~"$host"}) by (drpriority,drrole, elasticduration, elasticthroughput, export, heartbeattimeout, partitiondetection, prioritiesenabled, temptablesmaxsize)

commandlogfreqtime.text: frequency of cmd logging in milliseconds

commandlogfreqtxns.text: frequency of cmd logging in number of transactions

commandlogmode.text: cmd logging mode, sync or async

targets.expr: max (voltdb_systeminformation_commandlog_info{v2="1", namespace="$cluster", host_name=~"$host"}) by (commandlogenabled, commandlogfreqtime, commandlogfreqtxns, commandlogmode)
max (voltdb_systeminformation_snapshot_info{v2="1", namespace="$cluster", host_name=~"$host"}) by (snapshotenabled, snapshotfrequency, snapshotpriority, snapshotretain)

features_commandlogging.text: license supports the use of command logging

features_dractiveactive.text: license supports the use of cross data center replication (XDCR)

features_drreplication.text: license supports the use of passive database replication (DR)

features_trial.text: whether this is a trial license or not

targets.expr: max (voltdb_systeminformation_license_info{v2="1", namespace="$cluster", host_name=~"$host"}) by (features_commandlogging, features_dractiveactive, features_drreplication, features_trial)
